org.gridlab.gat.io.cpi
Class FileOutputStreamCpi

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.gridlab.gat.io.cpi.FileOutputStreamCpi
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileOutputStreamInterface, Monitorable
public abstract class FileOutputStreamCpi
extends Object
implements FileOutputStreamInterface

Capability provider interface to the FileStream class.

Capability provider wishing to provide the functionality of the FileStream class must extend this class and implement all of the abstract methods in this class. Each abstract method in this class mirrors the corresponding method in this FileStream class and will be used to implement the corresponding method in the FileStream class at runtime.

Method Detail

equals

public boolean equals(Object object)
Tests this File for equality with the passed Object.

If the given object is not a File, then this method immediately returns false.

If the given object is a File, then it is deemed equal to this instance if a URI object constructed from this File's location and a URI object constructed from the passed File's URI are equal as determined by the Equals method of URI.

Overrides:
equals in class Object
Parameters:
object - The Object to test for equality
Returns:
A boolean indicating equality

addMetricListener

public void addMetricListener(MetricListener metricListener,
                              Metric metric)
                       throws RemoteException
Description copied from interface: Monitorable
This method adds the passed instance of a MetricListener to the list of MetricListeners which are notified of MetricEvents by an instance of this class. The passed MetricListener is only notified of MetricEvents which correspond to Metric instance passed to this method.

Specified by:
addMetricListener in interface Monitorable
Parameters:
metricListener - The MetricListener to notify of MetricEvents
metric - The Metric corresponding to the MetricEvents for which the passed MetricListener will be notified
Throws:
RemoteException - Thrown upon problems accessing the remote instance

getMetrics

public List getMetrics()
                throws RemoteException
Description copied from interface: Monitorable
This method returns a java.util.List of Metric instances. Each Metric instance in this java.util.List is a Metric which can be monitored on this instance.

Specified by:
getMetrics in interface Monitorable
Returns:
An java.util.List of Metric instances. Each Metric instance in this java.util.List is a Metric which can be monitored on this instance
Throws:
RemoteException - Thrown upon problems accessing the remote instance

removeMetricListener

public void removeMetricListener(MetricListener metricListener,
                                 Metric metric)
                          throws RemoteException
Description copied from interface: Monitorable
